org.ndnx.ndn.impl.security.keys
Class BasicTrustManager

java.lang.Object
  org.ndnx.ndn.TrustManager
      org.ndnx.ndn.impl.security.keys.BasicTrustManager

public class BasicTrustManager
extends TrustManager

This is a very basic implementation of a TrustManager. It checks whether a content's publisher matches the expected publisher for a consumer.

Method Detail

matchesRole

public boolean matchesRole(PublisherID desiredRole,
                           PublisherPublicKeyDigest thisKey)
Checks if the publisher is the expected one.

Specified by:
matchesRole in class TrustManager
Parameters:
desiredRole - the desired role; either a specific key, or a key certified by another, specific key, and so on. Currently exploring the range of roles that are both useful and can be supported efficiently. Current production implementation only handles referring to specific keys.
thisKey - the key whose role we need to determine.
Returns:
true if thisKey matches desiredRole, false otherwise.
